dy_change_holder.componentleveltooltip: [[col:yellow]]You gain 1 Conclave Influence per turn per region you own.You can gain up to 5 additional Conclave Influence per turn from your Towers[[/col]]

hint_text.component_level_text: [[img:icon_armaments]][[/img]] Spend Armaments to forge additional standard-issue weapons and armour for units in each category, increasing their unit capacities. The number displayed beneath unit cards indicates current unit capacity.\n\n[[img:unit_capacity]][[/img]] Increasing total unit capacity in a category gradually unlocks more powerful forgecraft options in the Manufactory specified by the tooltips on each categoryâ€™s progress bar.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIf(self.CurrentState == "locked" && PlayersFaction.PooledResourceManagerContext.CanAffordSpecificPooledResourceCost(RequiredCostContext.PooledResourceTransactionList.FirstContext), self.ChildContext("sprite_progression_celebration").SetVisible(true) ) # important that this is ordered before state setter

localised_text.tooltip_text: Forge Armoury stock||Select to increase this unitâ€™s recruitment capacity
